Package ca.concordia.soen6441.project.phases

Class OrderExecution

java.lang.Object
ca.concordia.soen6441.project.phases.Phase
ca.concordia.soen6441.project.phases.Play
ca.concordia.soen6441.project.phases.MainPlay
ca.concordia.soen6441.project.phases.OrderExecution
public class OrderExecution extends MainPlay
The OrderExecution class represents the phase where issued orders are executed. It processes each player's orders in a round-robin fashion until all orders are executed.
